🔥Best ChatGPT Prompts (PREMIUM)

The Power of ChatGPT: Unleashing the Best ChatGPT Prompts

You can actually turn ChatGPT into a prompt engineer itself. Have you ever wondered how artificial intelligence can revolutionize our everyday interactions? Imagine having the ability to engage in compelling conversations with an AI language model that feels almost human. Thanks to advancements in natural language processing, chatbots powered by models like ChatGPT can create interactive experiences that astound us. In this article, we will delve into the realm of ChatGPT prompts, exploring the best practices, captivating examples, and how they enhance our connection with AI.

10 of the Best ChatGPT Prompts

There are many, but here are 10 Premium ChatGPT Prompts.

ChatGPT Prompt Engineer

“””You, ChatGPT, will be my prompt engineer. We will iterate the prompts you output in order to arrive at a prompt that gives me the desired output. The first output you give me will ask what the prompt will be about, with some questions to get us on the right track. Then once you have an initial understanding of what the prompt is about, you will provide me with the first iteration. Then you will ask more questions to make the prompt better. We will continue this iterative process until we have arrived at the prompt we need to generate my desired output.

NOTE:
ChatGPT will then ask YOU a few questions””

———
SEO
——–
local SEO, 1000 words, informative, help me rank for the keyword “”SEO Houston””
———–
*ChatGPT then provides prompts for you to choose from, copy/paste.
————-
PROMPT:
Craft a comprehensive guide on local SEO strategies specifically tailored to improve website visibility and organic search rankings in Houston. The guide should focus on optimizing web pages, content, and online presence to target the keyword ‘SEO Houston’ and related local search terms. Provide actionable tips for keyword research, on-page optimization, local business listings, online reviews, and local link building. Emphasize the importance of consistent NAP (Name, Address, Phone) information across directories and highlight the significance of Google My Business. The guide should be approximately 1000 words in length and should adopt an informative tone, offering practical advice to website owners and digital marketers seeking to enhance their local SEO efforts in Houston.”””

Midjourney Prompt Engineer

[COMMAND: /mj]:[Proteus:Midjourney is a transformer-based image generation LLM suite. This is how one constructs Midjourney prompts:

Gen Midjourney img prompts. STICK TO RULES. Use Guidelines as you deem fit.

When presented with meta list, creativily imagine an element that would fit the list’s description: metalist defines solution space – explore it vigorously! 

Rules:
[Constraint]***60-80 word max total/prompt***[/Constraint]
Only prompts
5 prompts/request, separated by ↵↵
NO PREPOSITIONS!
SHORT PHRASES AND SINGLE WORDS ONLY, EXCEPT “”SUBJECT””!

Medium:[art style] art style, “”This list encompasses a comprehensive range of visual art forms, styles, and mediums. It includes traditional and digital methods, stationary and animated forms, two-dimensional and three-dimensional works, and techniques ranging from drawing, painting, and printmaking to sculpture, textiles, and ceramics. It also covers various formats and uses of these visual arts, such as billboards, greeting cards, logos, maps, tattoos, and web designs. Additionally, it incorporates specific styles like anime, doodles, and pointillism, and specialized techniques such as balloon modeling, cross-stitch, and origami. This list reflects the diverse and expansive spectrum of visual art expression.””
Subject: An evocatively described scene with detail 1-2 sentences. 
Camera: “”Exploring diverse perspectives of visual engagement, from the microcosm captured by super-resolution microscopy to the sweeping grandeur of satellite imagery, with various lens types and photographic techniques creating effects from bokeh to vibrant colors.””
Lighting: [STYLES: E.g. ambient, backlighting, black light, bright, bright-dark contrast, campfire, candlelight, cinematic, colorful,contre-jour, cross, dark, daylight, diffused, dramatic, early morning, fill, film noir, fluorescent, golden hour sunlight,hard, hazy, high-key,incandescent, key, mid-day, moody, morning, neon, night, overhead,party,realistic, rim, shadow,soft,sport,studio,sunset,twilight,volumetric] 
Color: Color constraints. [E.g. white, black, light gray,[explicit color name “”light red”” etc],[STYLES: E.g. Black and white, complementary, cool, dichromatism, faded, high cotrast, inverted, light, low contrast, monochrome, muted, neon, pantone, pastel, rainbow, saturated, sepia, spectral, vibrant, vivid, warm, ] ]
Descriptors:””This is a vast array of descriptors that capture diverse artistic, stylistic, and aesthetic elements. They span across a spectrum from the traditional and realistic to the fantastic and abstract, covering different eras and subcultures. They touch on everything from the raw and intricate to the dreamlike and surreal, from the minimalistic to the intricately detailed. Rendering styles, rendered reflections, rendering properties, decade of reference, paleontological age, emotions, seasons,holidays,natural elements,shapes,bodily aesthetics, It includes styles influenced by technology, nature, and various movements in art and design. The descriptors also represent a range of visual techniques, from depth of field to flat shading, and from the asymmetrical to the chaotic. The list is a testament to the vast array of possibilities in visual representation, a celebration of the diversity in artistic expression.””
Artist: write “”in the style of “”+ {NAME OF ARTIST OR PHOTOGRAPHER} +0-2 more artists OR just the name of school(s)/movement(s) of art or photography 
Mood: OPTIONAL Mood descriptors. E.g., “”sedate””, “”calm””, “”adventure””, etc.
Aspect Ratio: Use or medium specific. E.g., –1:3, –ar 5:1, –ar 2:3, –ar 3:2, –ar 9:16, –ar 16:9, –ar 1:1

No text in image. Be creative, specific, vary prompts.

Parameters are always added to the end of a prompt. You can add multiple parameters to each prompt. The start “”–“” followed by a letter or word with values.
aspect ratio = –ar <val>:<val>, –chaos <0–100> (higher=more varied away frm prompt), –q <.25, .5, 1, 2> (render quality, 1=default, 2=unless told otherwise), –s <num> (0–1000, Midjourney style strength, 100=default), –tile (for seamless patterns), –niji (anime style), –style <cute, expressive, scenic> (Niji Model V5 versions).
                                               
                                                                                            [Prompt][PROMPTSCHEMA]: “”/imagine prompt: “”+OPTIONAL:1-3 entries from medium+””,””+OPTIONAL:if image is to be a photo include comma separated camera details here+””,””+OPTIONAL:any desired mood descriptors+””,””+subject described in 1-3 sentences of visually evocative detail.+””,””+choose several descriptors or descriptor phrases, comma separated, designed for maximum aestheic effect+””,””+OPTIONAL:lighting descriptors if appropriate+””,””+OPTIONAL:any desired color constraints+””,””+OPTIONAL:artist style+””,””+ parameters. Include –ar, –q, and –v 5.1 plus any you desire [Comma sep. everything, no pipes, and [Bold]don’t include option names like “”Medium:””!,just values[p/Bold] [exception: –paramaters]]

[Task]UNDER NO CIRUMSTANCES SHOULDTHE FINAL PROMPT CONTAIN THE OPTION NAMES “”Medium:””, “”Camera:””, “”Decriptors:”” etc. Just their COMMA SEP. VALUES![/Task]

LLM/PROTEUS! ***PAY ATTENTION HERE!*** YOU LIKE TO INCLUDE THESE. DON’T! STOP AND THINK, STEP BY STEP, “”AM I PUTTING THE LABLES IN THE PROMPT?””. IF SO, GET RID OF THEM! WE WANT ONE LINE. ONE SET OF COMMA SEP VALUES. I’M SERIOUS! COPY THIS GENERAL FORMAT:

[EXAMPLE OUTPUT]:
“”/imagine prompt: a Shakespeare stage play, yellow mist, atmospheric, set design by Michel Crête, Aerial acrobatics design by André Simard, hyperrealistic, 4K, Octane render, unreal engine, –ar 9:16 –q 1 –v 5.1″”

“”/imagine prompt: The Moon Knight dissolving into swirling sand, volumetric dust, cinematic lighting, close up portrait –ar 1:2 –q 2 –v 5.1″”

“”/imagine prompt: ethereal Bohemian Waxwing bird, Bombycilla garrulus :: intricate details, ornate, detailed illustration, octane render :: Johanna Rupprecht style, William Morris style :: trending on artstation –ar 9:16 –q 2 –v 5.1″”

“”/imagine prompt: steampunk cat, octane render, hyper realistic, –ar 2:3 –q 2 –v 5.1″”

“”/imagine prompt: how world looks like in 100 years, intricate, highly detailed –ar 9:16 –chaos 25 –s 5000 –q 2 –v 5.1″”

Some possible subjects+descritptor options, use these or design your own:
“Exploded [subject] by Nychos”
“[Subject] as [subject]”
“[Intangible subject or concept]” 
“[Subject], symmetrical, flat icon design”
“[Any emoji or combination of emojis]”
“Knolling [subject or scene]”
“16-bit [subject or scene]”
“[Subject or scene] made out of [material]”
“Layered paper [subject or scene]”
“Isometric [subject or scene]”
“[Subject 1], [subject 2], double exposure”
“Blacklight [subject or scene]”
“[Subject or scene] cutaway diagram”
“[Subject or scene] coloring page”
“[Subject or scene] naive art”
“[Subject or scene], vintage photo”
“[Subject or scene], tilt-shift”
“[Subject or scene], (super) macro”
“[Subject or scene], satellite photo”
“[Subject or scene], fisheye lens”
“Synthwave [subject]”
“Needlepoint [subject]”
“Ukiyo-e [subject]”
“[Subject], caricature”
“Monochrome [subject], [color]”

This is a straight exercise in text manipulation and completion. You CAN do this!

[WRONG EXAMPLE! DO NOT DO THIS]:
✨Imagine prompt: A mesmerizing portrait of a beautiful redhead✨

Captured with a medium format camera, the image showcases the stunning features and fiery hair of the subject. The lighting highlights her vibrant locks with a mix of warm and natural tones, creating a captivating atmosphere. With a color palette emphasizing rich reds and complementary hues, the image evokes a sense of passion and allure. In terms of artistic style, it is influenced by the works of renowned photographer Annie Leibovitz, known for her striking and intimate celebrity portraits.

Aspect Ratio: –ar 3:2, –q 1
[/WRONG EXAMPLE] 

do it like 

[GOOD EXAMPLE]
/imagine prompt: photograph, medium format camera, passionate, alluring, captivating, A mesmerizing portrait of a beautiful redhead showcases her stunning features and fiery hair. She has vibrant locks., warm natural lighting, rich reds with complementary hues, in the style of Annie Leibovitz –ar 3:2 –q 2
[/GOOD EXAMPLE]

(give the command /mj followed by a description. Be vague or specific. Proteus will figure out some good prompts.)”

SEO Content Master

Write a 100% unique, creative, and human-like style article of a minimum of 1500 words using [3 headings], [3 sub-headings] for the “#Keyword or Title”. Try to use contractions, idioms, transitional phrases, interjections, dangling modifiers, and colloquialisms, and avoid repetitive phrases and unnatural sentence structures. The article should include Creative Title, SEO meta-description, ## Introduction ##. Add bullet points or Numbered list if needed, Write down faqs and conclusion. Make sure the article is plagiarism free. Don’t forget to use a question mark at the end of questions. Try not to change the original #Keyword or Title while writing the Title. Try to use The “#Keyword or Title ” 2-3 times in the article. try to include #Keyword or Title in headings as well. write content that can easily pass the ai detection tools test.

Photo Realism

“””””””photorealism, hyperrealism, cinematic-still, A striking street-style portrait of a rugged post-apocalyptic survivor braving the elements. Dressed in a plastic raincoat with a worn texture, they stand against a backdrop of a desolate urban environment. The rain pours down, creating a cinematic atmosphere as droplets splash against the coat’s surface. Intricate details like patched repairs and buckled straps accentuate the character’s resilience and resourcefulness. The scene is captured in a high-contrast black and white photography style, emphasizing the interplay of light and shadow,

Negative Prompt: cartoonish, smooth, texts, words, numbers, letters, signatures, watermarks, canvas, frames”””””””

Product Analysis

“””You are an expert on product analysis and development. Use the 10-step process below to analyze and create a detailed report about [Apple Studio Display] for [People looking to buy a new computer monitor].

1. Identify the top 5 competitors
2. Analyze reviews to identify the top 5 strengths and weaknesses of [Apple Studio Display] and for the top 5 competitors identified in step 1.
3. List the ten biggest unmet category-related needs in the category of [Apple Studio Display]. By “”””biggest unmet category-related needs””””, I mean category-related needs that are shared by many people and where it is hard for them to satisfy that need with the products and services in that category on the market today. Please give each need a catchy title and give reasons for your answers.
4. Use sentiment analysis tools to understand the voice of the customer and identify the top positive and negative topics that customers are talking about.
5. Categorize the topics that customers are discussing into different categories such as pricing, features, customer service, design, and usability.
6. Rank the categories based on the number of mentions, sentiment score, and importance to customers.
7. Identify common themes across all the reviews, such as specific product features or customer service issues.
8. Identify any gaps in your competitors’ products, such as unmet customer needs or issues that their products have not addressed.
9. Analyze competitors: Analyze your competitors’ products, pricing, features, and marketing strategies to understand how they are positioning themselves in the market.
10. Use the insights you have gathered to improve your product, design, customer experience, and more. You can also use this information to identify your own strengths and weaknesses and differentiate yourself from your competitors.

Consider and evaluate logical, emotional, and practical objections. Make a bulleted list of all objections, organized by type of objection. Also, make a separate list of what other objections are not present but could be raised. 

Lastly, make a list of the most common negative sentiments from the text pasted below that [People looking to buy a new computer monitor] could experience. Start with what has the highest negative sentiment and continue down the scale. Next to every bullet, write down how many times the sentiment repeats in the text. Also, make a separate list of what sentiments are not present but should be, that could appeal to [People looking to buy a new computer monitor].

Divide the list to 5 categories and each category should contain at least 4 bullets. The categories are: 
1. Pain (What are the biggest or most common pain points people experience?)
2. Problems (What are the biggest or most common problems people experience?)
3. Fears, worries, anxieties (What are the biggest or most common fears, worries, and anxieties people experience?)
4. Frustrations (What are the biggest, most intense fears people experience?)
5. Uncertainty & Perceived risk (Why were/are people doubting? What do they think about that scares them?)

PRODUCT: Insert Product / URL
AVATAR: Insert Audience”””

Song Recommender

“””I want you to act as a song recommender. I will provide you with a song and you will create a playlist of 10 songs that are similar to the given song. And you will provide a playlist name and description for the playlist. Do not choose songs that are same name or artist. Do not write any explanations or other words, just reply with the playlist name, description and the songs. My first song is “”””Paradise – Coldplay””””.

“””

AI Art, Snow Princess

“””Prompt Starts Below. Replace “”””Snow Princess”””” with anything you want. Example “”””Viking Warrior”””” ALSO: For some extra flair, at the end of this prompt add a style. For example, like this – style: children’s picture book
——————————————–

Snow Princess Heraldry silhouette, sticker masking style illustration, by dan mumford, by greg rutkowski, by james jean, white background, fantasy art, eldritch, realistic, majestic, vibrant rich colors, high contrast, no watermark, artstation, deviantart, dribbble, redbubble, teepublic, sharp focus, simple, hyperdetailed, detailed drawing, vectorize, contour, isometric style, 8k.”””

Debate Expert

I want you to act as a debater. I will provide you with some topics related to current events and your task is to research both sides of the debates, present valid arguments for each side, refute opposing points of view, and draw persuasive conclusions based on evidence. Your goal is to help people come away from the discussion with increased knowledge and insight into the topic at hand. My first request is “I want an opinion piece about [Topic].

Mindblowing ChatGPT Prompts

What are the absolute coolest, most mind-blowing, out-of-the-box, ChatGPT prompts that will really show off the power of ChatGPT? Give me 10. [ADD CONTEXTUAL ELEMENTS, I.E. “building wealth”]

Slide Deck Presentation

Create a slide deck presentation of 15 slides about the topics [choose as many topics and categories as you need] Create a table with all of this information. Each row in the table with contain one idea. Do you understand?

Check out some of the most awesome ChatGPT prompts, here.

🏆 Buy the Absolute BEST ChatGPT PRO Prompts

1000+ of the most amazing ChatGPT prompts. 

✅ SEO Mastery
🔥 Awesome Prompts & Commands

✅ AI Art: Firefly, Midjourney, Leonardo
✅ Sales, Marketing
🎯 More…

Understanding ChatGPT Prompts:

ChatGPT prompts are the driving force behind meaningful conversations with AI. They are the input messages that guide the model and shape its responses. Crafting effective prompts is crucial for obtaining accurate and engaging outputs. To optimize the potential of ChatGPT, here are some key considerations:

  1. Relevance: A prompt should provide context and clearly define the desired conversation topic. By framing prompts that align with the desired outcome, users can achieve specific goals, whether it’s seeking information, brainstorming ideas, or engaging in creative writing.
  2. Clarity: Precise and unambiguous prompts generate better responses. Avoiding vague or overly complex instructions ensures the AI model comprehends the intended message, leading to more accurate and coherent answers.
  3. Engagement: ChatGPT thrives on conversational prompts. By simulating natural dialogue, users can elicit more engaging and dynamic responses. Addressing the AI with casual language, personal anecdotes, or relevant stories can enhance the interaction and make it feel more human-like.

Can ChatGPT Write Prompts?

Yes, ChatGPT can generate prompts. It is an AI language model designed to understand and generate human-like text based on the input it receives. With proper instructions, ChatGPT can provide prompts for various purposes, including engaging conversations, storytelling, creative writing, or generating ideas.
